original_text: And they rose up betimes in the morning, and sware one to another: and Isaac sent them away, and they departed from him in peace.
korean_text: 아침에 일찍이 일어나 서로 맹세한 후에 이삭이 그들을 보내매 그들이 평안히 갔더라

sentences.original_text: And they rose up betimes in the morning
and they departed from him in peace.
